Texto: 
patient elected to have a mastectomy.  nodes were negative.  she will receive chemotherapy followed by tamoxifen.
mammogram - spiculated mass and architectural distortion in the right breast, lower outer quadrant in the posterior third.
infiltrating lobular carcinoma confirmed by us core biopsy
breast cancer - infiltrating ductal carcinoma / infiltrating lobular carcinoma
surgical scar
radial scar
56yo female for routine screening mammogram
